amendment.description: To permit the enrollment in the conversation reserve program of certain land on which trees have been planted.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2085 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2085 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14143) To permit the enrollment in the conversation reserve program of certain land on which trees have been planted.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2085 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2085 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Harkin.
